Package suncertify.gui

Provides the GUI components for application.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ClientWindow Class ClientWindow extends ApplicationWindow.
OperationDialogPanel Class OperationDialogPanel extends JPanel Swing class to provide specific panel that has text edit controls used for data editing.
RecordTableModel Class RecordTableModel is the custom table model used by the ClientWindow instance.
ServerWindow Class ServerWindow extends ApplicationWindow.
SettingsDialogPanel Class SettingsDialogPanel extends JPanel and behaves like OperationDialogPanel.
 

Enum Summary
OperationDialogPanel.OperationType Enumeration of modes (types) of data editing.
SettingsDialogPanel.SettingsType Enumeration of modes (types) of settings panel representation.
 

Exception Summary
GuiException Class GuiException purposed to wrap all occurring exceptions, which thrown on the gui side of application.
 

Package suncertify.gui Description

Provides the GUI components for application.

This package contains all classes relating to the client GUI (both networked and standalone), and server GUI.
